content.rendered:
The Leo Club recognizes individuals who give $100 or more to University of La Verne Athletics each year. Gifts from Leo Club members ensure that our coaches and student-athletes have the resources necessary to compete for championships. Our student-athletes strive for success both on the field and in the classroom. Your support enhances their La Verne experience and serves as a meaningful source of encouragement.

Member Benefits

Members of The Leo Club enjoy special invitations to athletic events throughout the year.

How to Join The Leo Club

Gifts to any athletic designation can be made by cash, check, credit card by phone or online, and by mail. Checks are payable to the University of La Verne. If you have questions or would like to set up a pledge payment schedule, please contact Lucero Rojo, Assistant Vice President of Alumni Engagement, at (909) 448-4408.

All gifts to university athletics (including matching gifts from a donor’s employer) count toward the donor’s total giving in any fiscal year.

Membership is calculated by fiscal year (July 1-June 30) rather than every calendar year. You may give as many times as you wish in this date range to have gifts counted toward membership.

Give to Athletics
